words.defineEn: the act of tending to the hygiene, condition, and appearance of one's face, hair, teeth, skin, clothing, etc.
words.defineVi: hành động chăm sóc vệ sinh, tình trạng và diện mạo của khuôn mặt, tóc, răng, da, quần áo, v.v.

examples: The company's new product launch led to a fat increase in revenue.
The product launch went out with a bang, with a viral social media campaign and record-breaking sales numbers.
The company's new product line contributed to a significant increase in its overall yield for the quarter.
The new smartphone had the edge over the last product, with its larger screen and faster processor.
The new product will soon be available in stores nationwide.
words.defineEn: something that is created or grown for sale
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó được tạo ra hoặc phát triển để bán

examples: He carefully combed his hair before going out.
The police went over the house with a fine-tooth comb.
She used a small brush to comb her eyebrows into shape.
I looked everywhere with a fine-toothed comb but can't find my purse.
I usually stand in front of the mirror to comb my hair.
words.defineEn: a flat piece of plastic, metal, etc. with a row of thin teeth, used for untangling or arranging the hair
words.defineVi: một miếng nhựa phẳng, kim loại, v.v. với một hàng răng mỏng, dùng để gỡ rối hoặc sắp xếp tóc

examples: I had a brush with him a number of years ago.

The hairstylist used a round brush to create curls.

examples: They replaced their old toothbrushes with new ones.

He applied toothpaste to his toothbrush and started brushing his teeth in circular motions.
The dentist showed me the proper technique for brushing and gave me a new toothbrush.

words.defineVi: một bàn chải nhỏ có tay cầm dài mà chúng tôi sử dụng để làm sạch răng của chúng tôi

examples: Social workers operate on the razor’s edge.
Politically we are on a razor edge.
The country's future is balanced on a razor's edge.
He's a thrill-seeker who likes living on the razor's edge.

examples: He dropped the slippery soap in the shower.

words.defineVi: chất chúng ta sử dụng với nước để rửa và làm sạch cơ thể của chúng tôi

examples: Deodorants, however, inhibit bacterial activity and mask odors at the same time.
- You got bubble gum deodorant on?

- That's my deodorant, man.
That includes shampoo, makeup, perfume, cologne, deodorant, soap.

examples: She wasn’t wearing any makeup.
She looks a million dollars in her elegant evening gown and flawless makeup.

Emily woke up late and rushed to get ready for work, resulting in mismatched clothes, messy hair, and smudged makeup.
words.defineEn: any type of substance that one uses to add more color or definition to one's face in order to alter or enhance one's appearance
